thread.title: Tara Palmer-Tomkinson NEVER had a brain tumour
thread.title_full: Tara Palmer-Tomkinson NEVER had a brain tumour

title: Tara Palmer-Tomkinson NEVER had a brain tumour
text: Tara Palmer-Tomkinson NEVER had a brain tumour: Her sister reveals that the tragic It Girl made up the illness as friends say it was 'a cry for help' Socialite, former model and It Girl Tara Palmer-Tomkinson was found dead in her London flat last Wednesday Her sister Santa Montefiore took to Twitter yesterday afternoon to reveal the contents of coroner's report The grieving author wrote: 'Tara died of natural causes, a perforated ulcer. She did not have a brain tumour' Ms Montefiore later clarified that claims the star never has the illness despite saying she did were 'correct' Last year Tara revealed her fear of dying, saying she'd been diagnosed with a non-malignant brain tumour
